issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
When running churn on VMware+Precise I ran into the following issue with uploading a template for i-897042E1. Full log attached:
 
{code}
Thu May 31 16:55:27 2012 DEBUG VSphereVmManager        | 192.168.51.48: i-897042E1: completed [isTemplateUploaded=false] in 0ms
Thu May 31 16:55:27 2012 ERROR VSphereEndpointAsync    | upload of template disk failed
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at com.vmware.vim25.mo.ManagedObject.retrieveObjectProperties(ManagedObject.java:150)
        at com.vmware.vim25.mo.ManagedObject.getCurrentProperty(ManagedObject.java:179)
        at com.vmware.vim25.mo.Datastore.getSummary(Datastore.java:76)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereHost.getDatastoreById(VSphereHost.java:547)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereResource.getFileSizeViaSoap(VSphereResource.java:185)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereResource.getFileSize(VSphereResource.java:167)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereResource.getVmdkSizeBytes(VSphereResource.java:150)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereEndpoint.getDiskSize(VSphereEndpoint.java:785)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereVmManager.isTemplateUploaded(VSphereVmManager.java:326)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereEndpointAsync$8.call(VSphereEndpointAsync.java:364)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(FutureTask.java:334)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:166)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1110)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:603)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:679)
Thu May 31 16:55:27 2012  INFO SphereBrokerTaskFactory | 192.168.51.115: sending VSphereBrokerRunTask [E i-897042E1]: TaskOpEvent [FAILED]
Thu May 31 16:55:27 2012 DEBUG VSphereEndpoint         | 192.168.51.48: {986} getting cache write lock for emi-1A573954-E711E394-E87F702E for i-897042E1
Thu May 31 16:55:27 2012 DEBUG VSphereEndpoint         | 192.168.51.48: {986} getting session read lock
Thu May 31 16:55:27 2012  INFO SphereBrokerTaskFactory | 192.168.51.115: receiving VSphereBrokerRunTask [E i-897042E1]: TaskOpEvent [FAILED]
Thu May 31 16:55:27 2012  INFO BrokerInstance          | 192.168.51.115: goal change for instance i-897042E1: RUNNING -> NONE
Thu May 31 16:55:27 2012  INFO VSphereEndpoint         | session with vSphere endpoint apiType=VIRTUALCENTER apiVersion=4.1 reponse=76ms
Thu May 31 16:55:27 2012 DEBUG ereConfigurationManager | polling hosts on endpoint https://192.168.51.48/sdk
Thu May 31 16:55:27 2012 DEBUG VSphereVmManager        | 192.168.51.48: i-E43E3DF6: completed [isTemplateUploaded=false] in 114ms
Thu May 31 16:55:27 2012 ERROR VSphereEndpointAsync    | upload of template disk failed
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereHost.getDatastoreById(VSphereHost.java:547)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereResource.getFileSizeViaSoap(VSphereResource.java:185)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereResource.getFileSize(VSphereResource.java:167)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereResource.getVmdkSizeBytes(VSphereResource.java:150)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereEndpoint.getDiskSize(VSphereEndpoint.java:785)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereVmManager.isTemplateUploaded(VSphereVmManager.java:326)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereEndpointAsync$8.call(VSphereEndpointAsync.java:364)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(FutureTask.java:334)
{code}
fields.summary: Failure in uploading template to vmware node

comments.body:
Vasya,

We are seeing this behavior again in our latest automated runs. The distro was RHEL5 and the following was seen in the logs after the instance went from pending to terminated:

{code}
Mon Aug 6 21:43:22 2012  INFO SphereBrokerTaskFactory | 192.168.51.35: sending VSphereBrokerRunTask [E i-8FA741BE]: GoalChangeEvent [RUNNING->NONE]
Mon Aug 6 21:43:22 2012  INFO SphereBrokerTaskFactory | 192.168.51.35: receiving VSphereBrokerRunTask [E i-8FA741BE]: GoalChangeEvent [RUNNING->NONE]
Mon Aug 6 21:43:23 2012  INFO VSphereEndpoint         | closing session with a vSphere endpoint at https://192.168.51.48/sdk
Mon Aug 6 21:43:23 2012 ERROR VSphereEndpointAsync    | upload of template disk failed
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at com.vmware.vim25.mo.ManagedObject.retrieveObjectProperties(ManagedObject.java:150)
	at com.vmware.vim25.mo.ManagedObject.getCurrentProperty(ManagedObject.java:179)
	at com.vmware.vim25.mo.Datastore.getSummary(Datastore.java:76)
	at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereHost.getDatastoreById(VSphereHost.java:550)
	at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereResource.getFileSizeViaSoap(VSphereResource.java:185)
	at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereResource.getFileSize(VSphereResource.java:167)
	at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereResource.getVmdkFlatSizeBytes(VSphereResource.java:154)
	at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereEndpoint.getDiskSize(VSphereEndpoint.java:796)
	at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereVmManager.isTemplateUploaded(VSphereVmManager.java:326)
	at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereEndpointAsync$8.call(VSphereEndpointAsync.java:364)
	at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(FutureTask.java:334)
	at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:166)
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1110)
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:603)
{code}

Vic,
Do you have reliable reproduction steps?
I currently dont have any reliable steps to reproduce

We've seen connection interruptions with vCenter under load. I think at this point the best thing we can do is catch the NPE, return failure (probably by throwing RemoteException), and perhaps ensure the connection is reestablished upon the next request (which, I think, will happen automatically if the exception makes it back to VSphereEndpointAsync).

Found one more case.
{code}
2012-12-17 15:27:34  WARN | failed to refresh remote state of instance i-A98B4031
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at com.vmware.vim25.mo.InventoryNavigator.retrieveObjectContents(InventoryNavigator.java:66)
        at com.vmware.vim25.mo.InventoryNavigator.searchManagedEntity(InventoryNavigator.java:138)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereVmManager.waitForVirtualMachine(VSphereVmManager.java:125)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereVmManager.findVirtualMachine(VSphereVmManager.java:160)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereVmManager.isInstanceRunning(VSphereVmManager.java:388)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereConfigurationManager.checkRemoteState(VSphereConfigurationManager.java:519)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereConfigurationManager.pollInstances(VSphereConfigurationManager.java:245)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereConfigurationManager.mayPoll(VSphereConfigurationManager.java:186)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.Broker.mayPoll(Broker.java:56)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereEndpointAsync.ensureAndLockSession(VSphereEndpointAsync.java:709)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.vsphere.VSphereEndpointAsync$3$1.call(VSphereEndpointAsync.java:222)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(FutureTask.java:334)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:166)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1110)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:603)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:679)
{code}
The same suspect. Line 66 from InventoryNavigator.java:
PropertyCollector pc = rootEntity.getServerConnection().getServiceInstance().getPropertyCollector()
I can reproduse those conditions only using vCenter with updloadViaHost set to false.

Note to QA: I've created two ESXi hosts set up and hit it from Jenkins with constant run-image with random key pairs using 7 concurrent builds. I could see randomly popping NullPointerException in the cloud logs.

Dima,
Could you review my patch merged into maint/3.2/testing branch 61bb565f97c5b695de2ed67dcfe8cade57ed7c57?
I have been running bfebs churn for 8 hours and have still not seen this message.  I will let it run a bit longer then mark this as verified.

After bfebs churn for over 12 hours on a vmware did not have any of these messages.

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 3.2.1
Release     : 0.0.518.20130205git822b24b6.el6
